author: Special Correspondent
text:
Indian Medical Association’s recently formed Working Group to fight against noise pollution will have its sitting in New Delhi during this month.

The Working Group was formed along with the Association of Otolaryngologists of India (AOI) during the National Initiative for Safe Sound Leadership Meet and Workshop in Chennai recently. The meeting chaired by A. Marthanda Pillai, Immediate Past National President of IMA, took note of the fact of India being the noisiest place in the world.Anything above 80 decibel of noise is injurious for human beings not only to the ears, but also the entire body.
title: Panel to fight noise pollution
